SourceString: Welcome to the Casino, a gambler's<lf>paradise! This is the Casino Token<lf>Counter.
You can purchase Casino Tokens up to a<lf>maximum of 1000 tokens held.

I apologize, but you cannot buy any<lf>Casino Tokens if you are carrying over<lf>1000 tokens.
If you run low on Tokens for any reason,<lf>please come back and see me.

All
Thank you for using our service. Please<lf>come back anytime.
